title: Hyper text markup language
description: The standard markup language used to create the structure and layout of web pages.
mindes: You should not use HTML for styling. That is what CSS is for
small: I would suggest going through the freeCodeCamp HTML challenges to start learning the basics.
info: HTML uses to annotate text, images, and other content for display in a Web browser. HTML markup includes special elements: such as , , <body>, <header>, <footer>, <article>, <section>, <p>, <div>, <span>, <img>, <aside>, <audio>, <canvas>, <datalist>, <details>, <embed>, <nav>, <search>, <output>, <progress>, <video>, <ul>, <ol>, <li> and many others.

title: Cascading style sheet
description: cascading style sheet is used to style page structure.
